function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid surge in traffic on IoMT tech and telemedicine platforms due to COVID-19 outbreak","Impact":"Overload on technology infrastructure, potential for system crashes, and delays in patient care","Mitigation":"Scaling up server capacity, implementing load balancing, and optimizing data traffic management","Technologies":"Cloud computing, edge computing, and data optimization algorithms","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and platform users","Owner":"Technology companies, healthcare organizations, and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Relaxation of regulations for telehealth services","Impact":"Increased risk of misuse, data breaches, and privacy violations","Mitigation":"Enhanced data security measures, strict user authentication protocols, and continuous monitoring of telehealth platforms","Technologies":"Encryption technologies, multi-factor authentication, and AI-based anomaly detection","People":"Patients, healthcare providers, and telehealth users","Owner":"Regulatory bodies, telehealth service providers, and cybersecurity experts"}]}
